author: kevin-m
msg: Clean-up, including override class of MultiColumnCombinedCollectionMapper that (can) be used to replace CombinedCollectionMapper.
Some more work is required to allow easy selection of this mapper as default, in AbstractAutoMapper, via .properties.

author: kevin-m
msg: Alterations to sql-persistor to support One-to-many associations based on peer class and member name, instead of association class name.
1 column per parent class member is added to the child class.
